alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Glynn (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 1:27PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Camden and southeastern Glynn Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 127 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles west of Jekyll Island, or 9 miles southwest of Brunswick, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Brunswick, St. Simons Island, Dock Junction, Country Club Estates and Jekyll Island. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Glynn
